job_description:
The Job Overview

We are seeking a dedicated Vue.js front-end developer to join our growing company. You will work as part of a team to develop fast, well-tested, and performant code for various web and mobile applications using Vue.js. As a Vue.js front-end developer, you will be expected to work with standard programming tools such as version control and deployment software, follow industry best practices, write tests for the code you write, and follow all applicable coding guidelines.

Your duties will include taking part in daily scrums, writing and developing modules for existing Vue applications, integrating Vue into existing projects, writing code and tests for code, taking part in code review sessions, and using version control software to push and pull code for testing and deployment.

Responsibilities

Below are some of the responsibilities a Vue.js developer is expected to assume in their position:

Write performant code using core Vue, Vuex, and Vue Router to create websites and web applications

Create tests for code written by yourself and other web developers, full-stack developers, and software engineers

Integrate Vue into legacy projects

Diagnose and fix bugs and other software defects in new and existing Vue applications

Run code optimization tools and analyzers to spot and refactor inefficiencies to create highly performant code

Job Qualifications and Skill Sets

Below are the qualifications expected of a Vue.js developer:

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, or other related fields

Strong understanding of JavaScript and React JS, including the latest revisions of ECMAScript

Good knowledge of the Vue.js framework and related components such as Vuex and Vue Router

Experience with standard tools and services in JavaScript front-end development and software development, such as Git, GitHub, HTML5, Laravel, Angular, Node.js, and npm

The ability to work as part of a team, taking ownership of individual components and following coding guidelines to create performant components that fit into more-comprehensive projects

An understanding of advanced JavaScript concepts, such as dealing with asynchronous requests and dynamic content

Experience with integrating and maintaining external software libraries and APIs using a command-line interface and package managers

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, or other related fields
Strong understanding of JavaScript and React JS, including the latest revisions of ECMAScript
Good knowledge of the Vue.js framework and related components such as Vuex and Vue Router
Experience with standard tools and services in JavaScript front-end development and software development, such as Git, GitHub, HTML5, Laravel, Angular, Node.js, and npm
The ability to work as part of a team, taking ownership of individual components and following coding guidelines to create performant components that fit into more-comprehensive projects
An understanding of advanced JavaScript concepts, such as dealing with asynchronous requests and dynamic content
Experience with integrating and maintaining external software libraries and APIs using a command-line interface and package managers

job_description:
Our company sells and installs alarms across the United States, in addition to providing an industry-leading suite of software solutions. We are looking to hire Senior Software Developers - VUEJS experienced.

In this role, your Specific Responsibilities will include:
• Report directly to our Lead Developer, and collaborate with our COO/CEO and business stakeholders as needed.
• Complete project-based tasks as assigned.
• Developing interface applications using Vue.js
• Maintain a working knowledge of advances and trends in programming and technology
• Write clean, secure, test driven, easily maintainable and modular codes
• Design and maintain databases.
• Build reusable code and libraries for future use.
• Troubleshoot and debug applications.
• Implementing and maintaining fast and informative automated tests
• Collaborate and work with other software developers and user experience (UX) designers on the front-end needs of projects.
• Adhere closely to development plans and anticipate changes to specification or schedule as they become necessary during development.
• Stay engaged and responsive via collaboration tools such as Slack and Miro.
• All other job duties as requested

Qualifications

Experience: At least 4+ years software development experience.

minimum of 3+ years developing in VueJS

Preferred Experience

In addition to the qualifications listed above, the ideal candidate would possess one or more of the following:
• Advanced knowledge of JavaScript and ES6+ syntax
• Advanced knowledge and experience with the VueJS framework and core VueJS principles
• Complete understanding of Tailwind CSS framework
• Experience with server-side rendered apps
• Ability to write reusable, clean, and well-documented VueJS code
• Experience with dev packs like webpack, laravel-mix
• Experience maintaining project git
• Strong command of the English language
• Experience working for a growing small business

Additional Requirements
• Must be confident communicating and collaborating with our business leadership team; must also be able to understand business needs and take a solutions-oriented approach to the development process
• Must be comfortable working within a small, fast-paced, 100% remote development environment; prior track record of successfully working remotely is strongly preferred
• Must be reliable, resourceful, and highly self-motivated
• This is a fast-paced environment, and we are 100% geographically decentralized: all communications are managed virtually, and all employees and contractors work remotely.
• Must have a dedicated home office or workspace that is free from distractions
• Must be proficient with technology (e.g., G Suite, Microsoft Office, Slack, etc.), as well as able to learn and adapt to new tools and communications platforms with agility
• Must be flexible, resourceful, and highly self-motivated
• Must have a positive attitude and overall willingness to learn

FULL JOB DESCRIPTION

Our company sells and installs alarms across the United States, in addition to providing an industry-leading suite of software solutions that allows sales representatives, technicians, and referral partners to minimize overhead and maximize income. Our company values are Quality, Transparency, and Innovation. Our current leadership team has expertise in software development, technology, business process improvement, operations, and marketing, and we are looking for a dynamic, ambitious VueJS Software Development professional to add to the group.

This is a fast-paced environment, where we must react quickly, act decisively and always strive to “fail fast.” Above all else, our founders are passionate about creating opportunity for those that demonstrate ambition and strong work ethic. We love to identify, cultivate, and reward great talent. In keeping with that principle, we have a lean and flat organizational structure; you will be empowered to make decisions, and your work will directly impact the strategic direction and operational success of the business. As our business continues to scale, you and your role would be positioned to grow along with the company.

In order to thrive here, you must be highly self-motivated, responsive, and comfortable managing responsibilities in a remote work environment.

Virtual Alarm Dealer focuses on Direct Sales, Home Safety, and Sales. Their company has offices in Las Vegas. They have a small team that's between 11-50 employees.

You can view their website at http://virtualalarmdealer.com/

job_description: Looking for an experienced VueJs developer for ongoing Ed Tech project

Hello! We're a growing digital agency actively seeking a skilled Vue.js Developer to start immediately for an ongoing project. Your primary task will be to develop a Vehicle Warranty Calculator component for a Hugo-based website, backed by a .NET Core infrastructure.

Your responsibilities will include crafting a responsive calculator in Vue.js, integrating it seamlessly into our Hugo site, and working in tandem with our .NET Core backend team. You'll also collaborate with our UX/UI designers to ensure the component is in line with the site's overall design. Regular code reviews are part of our process, and we highly value constructive feedback.

We're looking for candidates with a minimum of 3 years of professional Vue.js experience, strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, and familiarity with .NET Core. Experience with Hugo or other static site generators is a plus, as is knowledge of RESTful APIs and AJAX.

This is a remote role with a preference for candidates who can work within the EST time zone. The role is expected to be ongoing, extending beyond the initial 2-3 months based on performance and project needs. When applying, please include portfolio examples that showcase your expertise in Vue.js and .NET Core.

Qualifications: We're looking for candidates with a minimum of 3 years of professional Vue.js experience, strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, and familiarity with .NET Core
The role is expected to be ongoing, extending beyond the initial 2-3 months based on performance and project needs
Responsibilities: Your primary task will be to develop a Vehicle Warranty Calculator component for a Hugo-based website, backed by a .NET Core infrastructure
Your responsibilities will include crafting a responsive calculator in Vue.js, integrating it seamlessly into our Hugo site, and working in tandem with our .NET Core backend team
You'll also collaborate with our UX/UI designers to ensure the component is in line with the site's overall design

job_description:
We are seeking an experienced VueJS developer to join our team on a freelance basis, with the opportunity to become a part of the company long-term. Our company is a fast-growing startup that is dedicated to creating innovative cybersecurity solutions. We are looking for a web developer who is passionate about creating high-quality, scalable, and maintainable code.

Responsibilities:

- Develop new features and functionalities for our web applications using VueJS.

- Collaborate with our team of designers, developers, and project managers to deliver projects on time and within budget.

- Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code that adheres to best practices.

- Optimize the performance of our web applications and ensure they are compatible with all browsers (mainly Chrome and Safari) and devices (desktop and mobile).

- Conduct code reviews and provide feedback to other developers on the team.

Requirements:

- At least 2 years of experience developing web applications using VueJS.

- Experience working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

- Strong knowledge of VueJS and its core principles.

- Familiarity with state management libraries such as Vuex.

- Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest.

- Experience with Git and GitHub.

- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

- Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

- Excellent communication skills in English.

Nice to have:

- Knowledge of Cloudflare Workers.

If you are passionate about developing high-quality web applications using VueJS and are looking for a challenging and rewarding freelance opportunity, we encourage you to apply for this position. Please submit your resume and portfolio of relevant work along with your application. We look forward to hearing from you!

Qualifications: At least 2 years of experience developing web applications using VueJS
Experience working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Strong knowledge of VueJS and its core principles
Familiarity with state management libraries such as Vuex
Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest
Experience with Git and GitHub
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Excellent communication skills in English
Knowledge of Cloudflare Workers
Responsibilities: Develop new features and functionalities for our web applications using VueJS
Collaborate with our team of designers, developers, and project managers to deliver projects on time and within budget
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code that adheres to best practices
Optimize the performance of our web applications and ensure they are compatible with all browsers (mainly Chrome and Safari) and devices (desktop and mobile)
Conduct code reviews and provide feedback to other developers on the team

job_title: Front End Software Developer - VueJS/ReactJS/Angular - India (Remote)
job_description:
Egen is a data engineering and cloud modernization firm helping industry-leading companies achieve digital breakthroughs and deliver for the future, today. We are catalysts for change who create digital breakthroughs at warp speed. Our team of cloud and data engineering experts are trusted by top clients in pursuit of the extraordinary. An Inc. 5000 Fastest Growing Company 7 times, and recently recognized on the Crain’s Chicago Business Fast 50 list, Egen has also been recognized as a great place to work 3 times.

The Application Development team's tech stack can consist of VueJS, ReactJS or Angular on the front end and also includes Typescript, NodeJS, Express, NestJS, PostgreSQL, RESTful Microservices, and cloud services.

In this role, you will be leveraging your well-versed knowledge of software engineering principles and system design along with a team of interesting and super-smart engineers to solve new and hard to solve business problems with elegant software. We hire Dynamic, Curious, Hustlers who constantly challenge themselves (and others) to grow and be innovative in their approach to bring concepts and designs to life and be committed to lifelong technology (and everything) learning.

Required Experience:
• Love of Javascript with a strong understanding of its design patterns, best practices, and style guides
• Strong production experience with Javascript MVC frameworks - preferably AngularJS, React JS, and/or VueJS
• C# and API Development (RESTful, GraphQL, .Net Web API) experience
• Test first and test often development approach with Karma and Jasmine, Mocha, or Protractor frameworks
• Ability to leverage Git version control in a production environment
• Have experience with and curiosity of agile and lean philosophies
• Have experience working and a strong understanding of object-oriented programing and browser technologies
• Ability to see and communicate your ideas to clients and the team
• Able to disagree with a smile :)

Learn more about Egen!
• Check out our Insights blog. Many of the thought-leadership pieces on our website are written by our own team of subject matter experts. Proof at Egen you can make a difference.
• Learn more about what we do. Let’s talk about joining a team of Egeneers which has made a real impact by revolutionizing the online grocery industry. This is just one of the many industries in which we are subject matter experts.
• Read about our company core values. Our core values are more than a statement on paper, we deliver on our commitments.

Qualifications: Love of Javascript with a strong understanding of its design patterns, best practices, and style guides
Strong production experience with Javascript MVC frameworks - preferably AngularJS, React JS, and/or VueJS
C# and API Development (RESTful, GraphQL, .Net Web API) experience
Test first and test often development approach with Karma and Jasmine, Mocha, or Protractor frameworks
Ability to leverage Git version control in a production environment
Have experience with and curiosity of agile and lean philosophies
Have experience working and a strong understanding of object-oriented programing and browser technologies
Ability to see and communicate your ideas to clients and the team
Able to disagree with a smile :)

job_title: Back-end PHP/ Full Stack PHP/Vue.js Developer
job_description:
OUR HIRING PROCESS:
• We will review your application against our job requirements. We do not employ machine learning technologies during this phase as we believe every human deserves attention from another human. We do not think machines can evaluate your application quite like our seasoned recruiting professionals—every person is unique. We promise to give your candidacy a fair and detailed assessment.
• We may then invite you to submit a video interview for the review of the hiring manager. This video interview is often followed by a test or short project that allows us to determine whether you will be a good fit for the team.
• At this point, we will invite you to interview with our hiring manager and/or the interview team. Please note: We do not conduct interviews via text message, Telegram, etc. and we never hire anyone into our organization without having met you face-to-face (or via Zoom). You will be invited to come to a live meeting or Zoom, where you will meet our INFUSEmedia team.
• From there on, it's decision time! If you are still excited to join INFUSE and we like you as much, we will have a conversation about your offer. We do not make offers without giving you the opportunity to speak with us live. After all, we consider our team members our family, and we want you to feel comfortable and welcomed.

INFUSEmedia, located in Boston, USA, specializing in B2B digital marketing, lead generation, and content marketing—is looking for an experienced Senior Full Stack PHP/Vue.js to develop, finalize, and support our software solutions and web platforms for online marketing processes. The ideal candidate will be part of a cross-functional team that will transform our digital capabilities.

We are proud to be one of the fastest-growing companies in the USA. Our clients are large international companies such as Microsoft, Google, Lenovo, Oracle, DELL, Cisco, Intel, Samsung, Panasonic, Red Hat, Salesforce, and IBM. We have over 1000+ employees all over the globe. We know that our employees are our most valuable asset, so we strive to attract and hire only the best talent. We grow in all key areas every year, and we don't plan to slow down any time soon.

Requirements:

Back-End:
• 5+ years of commercial PHP development experience, a deep understanding of OOP, MVC, ORM, as well as Laravel/Symfony.
• Experience with building REST API and using JSON.
• MySQL/MariaDB: Maintenance, optimization, and knowledge of complex queries (JOIN, UNION, subqueries).
• An understanding of the InnoDB engine, and experience in working with large databases.
• Real-time web application experience (WS, Long poll, AJAX).
• Inter-service communication knowledgeability (RabbitMQ/ Kafka /REST).
• Experience with inter-process communication, caching and message queues, and knowledge of key-value storages (Redis, Memcached).

Front-End:
• Experience with JavaScript /jQuery
• Knowledge of AJAX requests as well as their creation and optimization, and experience with Node.js, Bootstrap v3+.
• Ability to write memory-efficient front-end code.
• HTML/CSS: Flexbox/Grid, CSS/ Uikit and style optimization capabilities.
• JS frameworks - Vue.JS/React proficiency.
• Abilities to write and comprehend high-quality code that is understandable to other developers.

It will be a plus if you have experience with:
• Version Control Systems GIT teamwork.
• Writing unit tests.
• Linux/Unix, SSH/SFTP, bash commands, cron, and Nginx/Apache web servers.
• JS Tooling (Webpack/Browserify/npm/yarn).
• Async Javascript (event loop/promises, async/await).
• Independently and quickly locating and correcting errors in code.
• English technical writing
• Russian/Ukrainian languages

Responsibilities:
• Write complex, clean, well-documented, and reusable code.
• Optimize existing databases.
• Write complex but understandable and efficient requests to extract data.
• Ensure optimal performance, stability, and security when it comes to the systems.
• Improve user interface and user experience.
• Apply bug fixes and improvements based on users and QA reports.
• Allocate tasks and priorities for the team.
• Understand project goals and convert them into clear tasks for developers.

What we offer:
• Competitive compensation based on your experience and skills.
• Consistent monthly payments based on invoices (payments are made via Bank transfer / Payoneer/PayPal).
• Remote working from 14:00 to 23:00 EEST, which includes a one-hour break.
• We support work/life balance, and offer paid vacation leave as well as sick leave.
• Opportunities for professional and career development.
• You will have the opportunity to use modern approaches and tools to solve business problems.

Our recruitment process:
• Interview with HR
• Test task
• Online technical interview with team leaders
• Final interview with the Director of Technology

To learn more about INFUSEmedia, visit our website to view our vacancies and career opportunities:

http://infusemedia.com/

https://www.facebook.com/InfuseMediaUkraine/

https://www.instagram.com/infuse_media_ukraine/

DOU: https://jobs.dou.ua/companies/infusemedia/

Experience with building REST API and using JSON
